message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. I think you'll be very happy with it!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $12,000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $20,000 is significantly lower than what I'm willing to accept.  Could you meet me halfway at $16,000?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the compromise, I still believe that $12,000 would be a fair price for the product considering its value. I hope we can find a solution that works for both of us.
